basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I've always been a great problem solver, an independent introvert, and a technophile and currently, I'm pursuing my Bachelor's in Computer Science with strong programming skills and experience in developing parallel algorithms, I have practical experience in creating and improving multiple college-level projects.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: Audio Recorder
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working while learning basics of android development. I had to develop simple implementation for app that shows the current sound state on a nice visualization that you can have a lot of fun with. I've learned a lot!
